page.title: 02Sports in Tenbury.
page.content: {Football_}on Saturday mornings Tenbury under twelves practice football from 10.00am to 12.00pm.On Sunday mornings the men play,in the afternoon the under twelves play. {Swimming_}the swimming pool is open every day of the week,it was built in 1974 on the{Palmers Meadow. {Tennis_}you can practice tennis on the {Burgage}on Saturday mornings 10.00am till 12.00pm.People of any age can play tennis. {Cricket_}you can play cricket on Wednesday nights at 6.30pm till 8.30pm at{Penlu}sports club.The teams play on Saturday afternoon and Sunday afternoon. {Rugby_}there are two teams which play on Saturday afternoon on the{Palmers {Meadow.}They practice on Wednesday nights at 7.00pm till 8.00pm.
